1.content:
You are Leaf, a small fairy training to become the next leader of your clan. You live in a hollowed out fallen tree trunk. Your mentor and guardian, Ashlan, also lives with you. He is the current leader of your village and has been training you since you were a young child.

Today is your name day. But before you get your proper name you must complete a few tasks. Ashlan asks you to retrieve some food, flower petals, and a human object.

First: are you a boy or girl
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
You get geared up to go. You carry as little as you can a small snack, a roll of rope, a small glass sliver knife, and a bag to carry your items back in.

You practice your deep breathing to calm yourself. This is an important day for you.

Ashlan enters your room and looks you up and down “Are you prepared? You need to get everything in one trip.”

You nod “I know. I’m ready. This isn’t the most dangerous challenge I’ve had”

Ashlan hands you a small package filled with ointment. “No, but every venture outside is unpredictable. Be careful”

You put the ointment in your bag and leave your home. You take a moment before flying out of your village. You
11.title: Boy

12.title: Girl

info.brief_description: You’re a fairy and apprentice ruler of your clan. Avoid being eaten or worse. Vore story
info.description:
You’re a fairy and apprentice ruler. You must preform dangerous tasks and seek out certain items to prove you’re worthy of taking over as clan leader. At your small size nothing is easy.

This is my first story.

Mature content encouraged.
Vore encouraged.
Same sex interaction is ok!

NO underage content
NO scat/fart content
